metadata.title: CVE-2017-10904 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Qt for Android prior to 5.9.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitraryOS commands via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: qt4-x11: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'qt for android').
qtbase-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'qt for android').
